question: What is the theme of the 2019 edition of World Suicide Prevention Day (WSPD)?
option1: Take a Minute, Change a Life
option4: Light a candle near a Window
explanation: The World Suicide Prevention Day (WSPD) is observed every year on 10th of  September to provide worldwide commitment and action to prevent suicides. The 2019 theme is “Working Together to Prevent Suicide”.
